name: Beat Beat Leap
description:
Beat Beat Leap is a padding game that gives you the chance to have fun on the go, perform beats and play great music tracks.
By doing a variety of tasks, you can unlock different music and share your own dynamics from time to time. You can also purchase items to make your own characters more cool and score higher.
Features:
  - Entertainment and useful interactive games will help improve listening skills and accurately play rhythm patterns.
  - High quality audio tracks produced by professional audio producers and professional EDM musicians. This partnership helps us keep our applications up-to-date and provide you with better content on a regular basis!
  - Share your feelings with friends and other users!
Beat Beat Leap is fun for all players and easy to use for beginners! Start the game and feel the magic of the beat!
